content: 2014 was the chinese year of the horse the seventh sign of the zodiac we welcomed new foals born that year by knitting them a seventh this free pattern is written for 8ply/dk weight yarn and to fit a newborn babe with an approximate head circumference of 30cm 32 5cm or 35cm 3 sizes construction this hat is constructed from the brim upwards and is knit in the round it features a very simple textured stitch that will work well for solid semisolid or variegated yarn the crown of the hat is finished without having to incorporate the textured stitch into crown decreases you will need to know how to knit small circumferences in the round either utilising magic loop or with double pointed needles if you are not familiar with these techniques you may need to reference a knitting guide book or view videos on the internet if you need pattern support please visit my group 1 **i have a very similar pattern for the whole family traditional versus modern 2 ** 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/pekapeka-design-studio 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/traditional-versus-modern
